alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:15PM AKST until January 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph may lead to visibility reductions to a half of a mile. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast, Northwest Arctic Coast and Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast; Western Arctic Coast
